sourceDesc.p: M.R. James, Descriptive Catalogue of the Manuscripts in the Library of Corpus Christi College, Cambridge 1912

projectDesc.p: The James Catalogue was digitized then marked up following the TEI P5 Guidelines. The customized model was provided by Giuliano Di Bacco, stored in an ODD file (parkerweb.xml): the latter was written by GDB using ROMA vers. 2.x, with manual adaptations. The ODD file is used as a source to compile the actual schema used to validate the xml: it is advisable to compile it in RelaxNG sintax (parkerweb.rnc) through ROMA.

msDesc.head: Johannes Marienwerder, Septililium uenerabilis dominae Dorotheae. Walahfrid Strabo, Vita et miracula Sancti Galli
[Untitled]
msDesc.p: Paper, 295 210 , 11.7 x 8.3, ff. 2 + 269, three volumes, single lines 37 and double columns of 47 and 40 lines. Cent. xv early (1403), in three hands.

Volume II: Double columns of 49 lines.
Volume III: Double columns of 45 lines.
Binding, white skin over boards: metal tags, two on first cover, mark of that on second cover: paper label ·123· Small bosses, one strap.
List of contents on flyleaf (f. br)

ff. ir-iir, closely written in clear hand, contain prayers in German, beginning imperfectly:
a.
Confession. - sundir mit wissen vnd vorsatz. For the beginning see f. 154v.
b.
Herre Ihesu Christe der du gesprachen host seben wort.
c.
Almechtigen vnd ewiger got der weynenden vroude.
d.
Daz ist eyn gut gebethe vnd heist dy bichte.
Herre Ihesus Ich gebe mich schuldig.
e.
Dys ist der vyrde salme in der septenen, etc.
Erbarme dich herre.
f.
O heyliger herre synte Erasmus merterer.
Wer dys gebeth alle suntage spricht vnd gebit eyn brot durch got den armen, etc.

msItem.head: Johannes Marienwerder, Septililium uenerabilis dominae Dorotheae
msItem.rubric: Hic primo habetur oracio ad impetrandum xxxvj gradus caritatis venerabili domine dorothee reuelatos. Post hanc oracionem ponuntur dicti gradus summatim prout habentur tercio capitulo primi libri qui dicitur septililium predicte d. dorothee. Tercio habetur hic vita valde curta eiusdem domine jam premisse. Oracio seu meditacio in septem particulas distincta, etc.
msItem.incipit: Domine deus qui precipis michi ut te diligam
msItem.rubric: Hic est diligenter aduertendum quare caritas dicatur Immortalis
msItem.incipit: Uenerabilis memorie domine dorothee vidue in ecclesia Pomezaniensi recluse vite sanctitas
msItem.explicit: medullitus ymmolemus dicentes gloria tibi domine
msItem.ab: A second copy of the prayer on ff. 1r-4v
msItem.rubric: Incipit Prologus qui licet communiter omnibus venerabilis Domine Dorothee libris posset premitti specialiter tamen debet ultimis septem tractatibus unum librum constituentibus anteponi qui appellatur septililium. Scriptor gestorum venerabilis domine dorothee non valuit conuenienter se ne scriberet hunc librum et libros alios excusare
msItem.ab: Tractatus I. De caritate, beginning with the 36 gradus caritatis (ut supra f. 4v)
Tractatus II. de spiritus sancti missione
Tractatus III. de venerando eukaristie sacramento
Tractatus IV. de contemplacione venerabilis domine Dorothee
Tractatus VI. de perfectione vite christiane
The Latin text of this ends
msItem.explicit: Sponsa ergo domini acquiescens ammonicioni sic studuit confiteri per singulas vices secundum domini instrucciones et iussiones. fecit varias confessiones. Quarum multe ab eius ore conscripte pro simplicium edificacione in suo wlgari scilicet theotunico sunt relicte
msItem.rubric: Dy selige vrowe dorothea czu marienwerdir hot gelart von vnserem allirlibisten hern manchirley ding das her se hys beychten. vnde der synt vil hy noch geschreben alz sy von irn beychtigern von irem munde synt geschreben von den vomf synnen
msItem.incipit: Ich arme dorftige sunderynne Ich bekenne gote meynen allerlybesten hern
msItem.explicit: vnd Ablas vbir myne svnde vnd das ir gote vor mich betet. Amen. Amen
msItem.rubric:
Hy geen aus dy beychten der seligen vrowen dorothee
Laus tibi sit Christe quoniam liber explicit iste
Deo gratias
Explicit liber Septililij venerabilis domine dorothee vidue benedicte. Et est finitus feria quarta In vigilia Sancti Nicolai presulis hora quasi xij. anno domini mill. cccco iiio
msItem.ab: dorch meynen wyllen geleden hunger vnd dorst hyczcze vnd vrost
In the hand of f. ir. The beginning of the matter on f. ir
msItem.incipit: Noch der worheit vnd an vorziige der heyligen lever. eyn grunt vnd eyne thoeyr aller togunt
msItem.explicit: vnd in beten ny volkomelich gelebet habe

head.title: Tractatus quidam juris super hanc decretalem omnis utriusque sexus de penitenciis et remissionibus

msItem.incipit: Reuerendo in christo ... Kel (?) dei gratia Ep. ffrisingensi ... hinricus de odendorf de colonia utriusque iuris et artium professor
msItem.ab: Tables of chapters in the Six Particulae

ab.handNote: The hand changes near the end

msItem.explicit: de adiutorio dei cui pro fine sit laus honor et gratiarum accio in secula seculorum. amen

msItem.head: Walahfrid Strabo, Vita et miracula Sancti Galli

head.title: Vita b. Galli diuisa in duos tractatus

msItem.incipit: Cum preclara sanctissimi viri viri Columbani qui et columbina conuersacione per omnem hyberniam
msItem.explicit: Ac quot hic prioris libelli finis que premissa sit terminet et sequenti que restant sine preiudicio comprehendenda inseruet
msItem.ab: 1. Quomodo hostes sepulcrum b. Galli uiolauerunt

46. Ceca illuminata.
Candela celicus accensa.
Scotus multiplici debilitate curatus
msItem.explicit: medelam implorare digneris (bis) per d. n. I.

head.title: Sermons on the dedication of a church and the Virgin Mary
De sententia excommunicacionis et de penitencia sec. determinacionem juris

msItem.ab: Title in the list of contents
msItem.incipit: Domine ad adiuuandum me festina ps. 69. transpne in canone
msItem.explicit: concedere non autem (?) indulgenciam. est finis
